alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Orange; Seminole; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 27 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard, Orange, Seminole and Volusia. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Titusville, Oviedo, Mims, Scottsmoor, Haulover Canal, Christmas, Chuluota, Geneva, Bithlo, Playalinda Beach, Merritt Island Wildlife Refuge, Klondike Beach, Turnbull, Aurantia, Lagrange, Shiloh and Lake Harney. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
